in-target mkdir -m 777 /Install_Logs; \

#General

in-target /bin/sh -c 'echo "


LmQvbXlPdmVycmlkZXMKdGVlIC1hIC9ldGMvc3lzY3RsLmNvbmYgPDxFT0YKCiNET0NLRVIgUk9PVExFU1MKbmV0LmlwdjQuaXBfdW5wcml2aWxlZ2VkX3BvcnRfc3RhcnQ9MAprZXJuZWwudW5wcml2aWxlZ2VkX3VzZXJuc19jbG9uZT0xCkVPRgo=" | base64 -d | sh > /Install_Logs/Initial-Setup.log 2>&1'; \

##RAW COMMAND SEQUENCE##

apt-get update
apt-get install -y cloudflared docker-ce-cli git nvidia-container-toolkit nvtop
install -g docker_ct -o docker_ct -d /Docker /Docker/Scripts
echo "IP ADDRESS:/Downloads /Downloads nfs noauto,x-systemd.automount,_netdev 0 0" >> /etc/fstab
echo "0 0 * * 0 /Docker/Scripts/DockerBak.sh" | crontab -
echo "0 0 * * * /Docker/Scripts/DockerPull.sh" | crontab -u docker_ct -
echo "net.ipv4.ping_group_range = 0 1000" >> /etc/sysctl.conf
echo "docker_ct ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: /usr/local/bin/cloudflared --config /Docker/cloudflared/config.yml service install, /usr/bin/mkdir /etc/cloudflared, /usr/bin/cp /Docker/cloudflared/config.yml /etc/cloudflared/config.yml" > /etc/sudoers.d/myOverrides
tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf <<EOF

#DOCKER ROOTLESS
net.ipv4.ip_unprivileged_port_start=0
kernel.unprivileged_userns_clone=1
EOF

#Docker

in-target /bin/su - docker_ct -c 'echo "" | base64 -d | sh > /Install_Logs/Docker.log 2>&1'; \

##RAW COMMAND SEQUENCE##

curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com/rootless | tee /Docker/rootless.sh && chmod +x /Docker/rootless.sh
tee -a /Docker/rootless.sh <<EOF

sleep 40 && sed -i -e '/^nohup.*&$/d' -e '/^disown$/d' -e '/^sleep.*&$/d' /home/docker_ct/.bashrc && rm -- "\$0"
EOF
tee -a /home/docker_ct/.bashrc <<EOF

nohup sudo cloudflared --config /Docker/cloudflared/config.yml service install > /Install_Logs/Cloudflared.log 2>&1 &
disown
nohup systemctl enable cloudflared >> /Install_Logs/Cloudflared.log 2>&1 &
disown
nohup cloudflared tunnel --config /Docker/cloudflared/config.yml run Docker >> /Install_Logs/Cloudflared.log 2>&1 &
disown
nohup /Docker/rootless.sh >> /Install_Logs/Docker.log 2>&1 &
disown
export PATH=/home/docker_ct/bin:$PATH
export DOCKER_HOST=unix:///run/user/1000/docker.sock
sleep 20 && nohup docker compose -f /Docker/docker-compose.yaml up -d >> /Install_Logs/Docker.log 2>&1 &
disown
EOF

#Sendmail

in-target /bin/sh -c 'echo "" | base64 -d | sh > /Install_Logs/Sendmail.log 2>&1';

##RAW COMMAND SEQUENCE##

sed -i '/dnl # Default Mailer setup/,$d' /etc/mail/sendmail.mc
tee -a /etc/mail/sendmail.mc <<EOF
dnl # Default Mailer setup
FEATURE(\`authinfo',\`hash -o /etc/mail/authinfo/gmail-auth-info.db')dnl
MAILER_DEFINITIONS
MAILER(\`local')dnl
MAILER(\`smtp')dnl
define(\`SMART_HOST',\`[smtp.gmail.com]')dnl
define(\`RELAY_MAILER_ARGS', \`TCP \$h 587')dnl
define(\`ESMTP_MAILER_ARGS', \`TCP \$h 587')dnl
define(\`confAUTH_OPTIONS', \`A p')dnl
TRUST_AUTH_MECH(\`EXTERNAL DIGEST-MD5 CRAM-MD5 LOGIN PLAIN')dnl
define(\`confAUTH_MECHANISMS', \`EXTERNAL GSSAPI DIGEST-MD5 CRAM-MD5 LOGIN PLAIN')
dnl
EOF
mkdir -m 700 /etc/mail/authinfo
echo 'AuthInfo: "U:root" "I:email@gmail.com" "P:xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx"' > /etc/mail/authinfo/gmail-auth-info
makemap hash /etc/mail/authinfo/gmail-auth-info < /etc/mail/authinfo/gmail-auth-info
rm /etc/mail/authinfo/gmail-auth-info
chmod 600 /etc/mail/authinfo/*
chown root:smmsp /etc/mail/authinfo/*
m4 /etc/mail/sendmail.mc > /etc/mail/sendmail.cf
systemctl enable sendmail
